name: Vsort
body:
# vSort vSort is a simple jQuery plugin for making lists sortable with a handle < 1.5kB minimized including css [](http://code.mgvz.com/vSort/) [Demo](http://code.mgvz.com/vSort/) Tested in IE8, FF To include vSort plugin ```html ``` To run a javascript code after sorting is done ```html data-callback="alert('list order modified')" ``` Sample code ```html
111111
111111
222222
222222
222222
333333
333333
333333
333333
``` To update vSort-lists after new items are added to sort container ```javascript $(document).vSort(); ```
